Reviews.Title: NEW BLACKBERRY PERAL 8120 UNLOCKED BLUE WIFI GSM PHONE
Reviews.Author: mirano
Reviews.Content: The product was meant to be returned but you never got back to me and like I said you are very quick in responding to an order but when it comes to returning an item you don't react as quickly. In fact I sent several messages to everyone concerned but you have ignored all of it. So I will not use your company to purchase anything anymore and this is for sure. In fact, I will also tell about my experience to my family who I know buys a lot from you. This is my review on the product and about your company.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Seller
Reviews.Author: rbolivar720
Reviews.Content: I received the product in perfect condition as it indicated the seller, I recommend it 100%, it has worked very well! has the Blackberry operating system which allows me to enjoy many applications, including use much to my studies because it is very useful in every way!

Reviews.Title: Ok but not fine
Reviews.Author: Juan Ponce "Relámpago Azul"
Reviews.Content: I'm not sure if the phone was new, it comes with a motorola charger, with a generic leather case. Don't come with 2 Gb SD that the new equipment have.It's works, but the seller write it's new.The phone have WiFi and, BB system op 4.2. 1.2 Mp camera.

Reviews.Title: Best non-smart phone I have ever used!
Reviews.Author: E. S. Gowen
Reviews.Content: I admit that this phone is inferior to many smart-phones that are currently on the market. Those all, however, require a data plan to use. If you are like me and want a quality phone without having to pay for a data plan then this is the phone for you.Pros:-Modified qwerty keyboard. While it is not a full qwerty (most of the buttons share two letters) I only commonly run across one mix up ("see" and "are"). That is a HUGE improvement over 9 key.-A smart phone quality calendar.-It is the only phone of which I am aware that has wifi, but doesn't require data-Very good media player-Bluetooth-Great Address book options.-You can search texts-Unlimited text space (not the 500 text limit many phones have)-Voice dialing-Fits very well into a pocket-Can set any size file as a ringtone, alarm, etc....I could go onCons:-The camera and video camera are not very good. I understand that there are people for whom a phone camera is more important than a calendar or address book or wifi then this is not the phone for you.-After a year or so of use the track ball needs to be cleaned or replaced for $0-$5 depending on your provider.I have used many many phones, but this is far and away the best NON-SMART phone I have ever used. Ever.

Reviews.Title: cell
Reviews.Author: alex
Reviews.Content: I'm satisfied with the purchase, everything is perfect, everything arrived at the expected time, recommend it, in a good product

Reviews.Title: Be aware!!
Reviews.Author: Hilton. B
Reviews.Content: Stay far away from this seller and product. Luckily  I had AMAZON GUARANTEE PROTECTION so I was able to get back my money...

Reviews.Title: Good product... good price.
Reviews.Author: Jose M
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone to my girlfriend and she is happy with it. The phone works well and looks good.

Reviews.Title: Mal Vendor y Mal Equipo
Reviews.Author: Leonardoeqv
Reviews.Content: El proucto me llego despues de 6meses, el equipo cuando lo fui a instalar en venezuela por movilnet fue reportado como robado "ya estaba en uso", una estafa totalmente...lejos con este vendedor y con su articulo. no lo recomiendo.

Reviews.Title: Oferta engañosa!!!
Reviews.Author: Gerardo Valero
Reviews.Content: El equipo parace ser recostruido o OEM ya que el cargador es Motorola, ademas del estuche que no es original Blackberry. / Is a Cel Phone OEM or refurbished because  not have the original chager and the case is motorola. Please Beware.
